title: Remakes
body: Being in ranked queue on OCE sucks, you wait ten minutes to get support with a friend and 3 minutes in the enemy team ffs. Why doesn't the team that didnt remake get some sort of LP gain, a forfeit is still a forfeit, regardless of the circumstances. I'm not saying the full LP, but a victory/ half LP for it.

replies.body: I got a remake today, and a NEAR remake that my team didn't accept (but we still won 4v5 anyway ;)  )
